VideoOverlay.mode

機能/意味
Specify overlay or layer drawing
タイプ
VideoOverlayクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
Indicates whether the mode is overlay mode, layer drawing mode, or mixer mode. You can also set a value.
vomOverlay for overlay mode, vomLayer for layer drawing mode, vomMixer for mixer mode, and vomMFEVR for Media Foundation mode.
vomMFEVR mode is only available in 1.2.0 and later.
